basics.name: *redacted*
basics.label: Full-Stack SDE in Machine Learning
basics.summary: From prototype to production, I value data-driven reactive architecture and clean functional code. I construct pipelines that transform data into impactful insights and products. An outspoken team player and quick learner, I thrive in collaborative, fast-paced environments, tackling challenging problems with exceptional communication skills.

work.name: OneLogin by One Identity
highlights: Solely maintained a suite of microservices comprising a machine learning-based Account Takeover Protection core product feature.
Worked closely with Ops team to migrate AWS Elasticsearch indexes, cutting bill by >75% while maintaining service performance.
Wrote whitepaper on the life-or-death importance of a Unified Identity Platform, IAM, and Zero-Trust Architecture in the years to come.
work.summary: I took over maintaining a complex microservices suite amidst resource challenges, showcasing adaptability and problem-solving skills. I facilitated cross-team communication using Msft Teams, engaging stakeholders across the company. Leading process improvement meetings, we drove impactful changes adopted company-wide.

work.name: Flexe
work.summary: Instilled a love of test-driven development, actionable metrics, and DevOps ownership under our mission-driven, transparent leadership (heavily ex-Amazon)
highlights: Led the design and development of a new Order Management System feature, unlocking new mid-complexity customers with over 70,000 orders per month
Building and designing features for a rapidly growing product / customer base
Full-stack duties spanning a tech stack of Typescript, Ruby, and Scala
Infrastructure-as-code, microservice architecture, clean API design

work.name: MAANA
highlights: Optimized 4 AI Azure Kubernetes Microservices by implementing asynchronous calls and reducing image sizes by >70%
Streamlined customer ETL workflows by building a text annotation dashboard for custom Named Entity Recognition
Led research and design of API for External UI Integration feature
Delivered first-in-class training material for Top Oil Company on proprietary data modeling platform
work.summary: I supported a team of talented data scientists by handling infrastructure, integration, and frontend tasks, demonstrating versatility and collaboration skills. Under Chief Scientist Steve's leadership, we flourished in a creative and enjoyable environment.
